sentence.Network_en: The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

sentence.Network_en: He noticed that fabric was tearing away from the plane's wing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他注意到机翼在一块一块地断裂。

sentence.Network_en: The plane had been cleared for landing at Brunswick's Glynco Airport.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机获准降落于不伦瑞克的格林科机场。

list.abs: ...ing)以及通过高空飞索(flying fox)、滑雪飞机(ski plane)或者直升飞机展开的“观景之旅”，去往那些不易接近的壮观景点。
... ski pants 滑雪裤 ski plane 滑橇起落架飞机, 雪上飞机 ski bob【 体】雪犁; 自行雪橇(形似自行车, 以雪板代轮的雪中滑行橇).

means.word_mean: 1. an airplane equipped with skis so it can land on a snowfield
